divs: sighting details i lived in la 92-96. i was married at the time and travelling with my wife from la west hollywood up the freeway to ventura county. it was between april 93-august 93, or april 93-august 94. clear day. i was passenger, my wife was driving. while heading towards ventura county i spot a "cloud" forming about 5,000 feet away, at an elevation of about 500-800 feet. it is forming from a small circle and is expanding into a rectangular cloud, which i estimate from inception to completion was about 30 seconds. i ask willow my wife, to look at it and demand she pull over. she does so. we both get out of the car and look up. it is about 800 feet away, at an elevation of about 500 feet. the cloud is not moving. it simply looks like a rectangular cloud i estimate between 50-80 feet long, by 20-30 feet. as we are staring at it, i did notice other drivers pull up and stop, too. after about 10 seconds, a ball appears from the cloud. it is a perfect ball. it looks sort of copper\brown in color. no lights. no sounds. it moved up about 50 feet and then darts west of my view about 600 feet within less than 1 second in a curve s now it is about 800 feet in the air. it stops and remains stationary for about 3 seconds then drops down 400-500 feet (so it is momentarily about 300 feet from the ground and loops back up and heads into the cloud. this manouver was faster than the first and took less than a second, too. the ball was about 30 feet i guess in diameter - though oddly, i seem to recall it slightly of a larger diameter than the cloud. it "hit" the cloud while accelerating - but nothing came out to other side. no sonic crack - nothing. over the next 30 seconds the cloud "vaporizes" and simply evaoprates. there is nothing there. my wife and i (divorced now) were religious as we did not want to discuss it after we saw it. i know others saw it, too - as they were parked watching, but we did not speak to them, we drive off. i thought i would finally report it as to this day - depsite me being very anti-religious and very oriented in the sciences, the fact remains it was real and happened in broad daylight. there must be others who have since reported this incident. this is the first and only ufo i have ever seen. thank you for your time.
Summary: cloud emits orb. flys. returns to cloud. vanishes.
